title: GET UP AND DANCE W/ Michael "Boogaloo Shrimp" (TURBO From The Movie Breaking)--YOU CAN LEARN TO POPLOCK or better our skills--Master Class For Discounted price.
desc: Come Work off that Turkey, and get the Christmas gift that keeps giving your heath dance off the weight. For a one limited time, ELECTRIC BOOGALOO HIMSELF, Michael Boogaloo Shrimp Chambers will be teaching a master class to teach His priceless skills of dance to eveyrone. His performance in the movie breaking was historical and helped to promote the art of breaking world wide. This gifted teacher also worked with the King of Pop Himself Michael Jackson. So come learn a new skill learn from a dance master at the master class on December 12 its free for the first 5 people. Also refreshments will be served while supplies last.
